articles.title: Nearly 500 Moderna COVID vaccine doses discarded in Grafton, Wisconsin at Aurora Medical Center - WLS-TV
articles.description: Nearly 500 Moderna COVID vaccine doses were discarded in Grafton, Wisconsin at Aurora Medical Center after being left out of a pharmacy refrigerator overnight.
articles.content:

articles.author: Associated Press Staff
articles.title: 500 COVID-19 vaccine doses discarded at Milwaukee-area clinic - Chicago Tribune
articles.description: Clinicians had to discard about 500 doses of the Moderna vaccine after vials were kept unrefrigerated for too long.

articles.author: Jan Lopatka, Emilio Parodi
articles.title: EU is asked to approve extra dose from Pfizer vaccine vials - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union was asked on Tuesday to allow an extra dose of the COVID-19 vaccine developed by Pfizer and BioNTech to be taken from each vial, a practice allowed elsewhere that would make scarce supplies go further.

articles.title: U.S. could be missing the new Covid variant ‘because the holes in our net are too wide,' expert says - CNBC
articles.description: A smaller sample of virus sequences means the new mutation could already be present in the country without having been detected, the CDC says.
articles.content:
